article_title: Bishop Braxton: Pope’s visit to the U.S. will have lasting impact
article_text:
Bishop impressed with ‘scope and depth’ of pope’s address to Congress

He says attending events last week was an ‘extraordinary opportunity’

Bishop says many people outside the church intrigued by Pope Francis

article_metadata.news-keywords: Bishop Edward Braxton, Pope Francis, Diocese of Belleville, Congressman Mike Bost, Washington D.C., Philadelphia, World Meeting of Families
article_metadata.description: Bishop Edward Braxton of the Diocese of Belleville described the Holy Father — Pope Francis — as “gracious, personable, warm and kind.”
